structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Hired Property; Buying Or Receiving With Intent To Defraud
law.text: Whoever, with intent to defraud, buys, receives or aids in concealing personal property, knowing it to be hired or leased or held as collateral security, shall be punished by a fine of not more than one hundred dollars or by imprisonment for not more than one year.
